responses.rationale: The segment provides factual statistics on cases and deaths without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment states human infection is rare and describes the condition neutrally without high-potency language.
The verb 'cull' describes an action (control measure), not the alarming impact or spread of the threat itself. No high-potency language used.
The segment states the number of deaths factually. 'responsible for' is not a high-potency verb framing the situation alarmingly.
